formable_nations_mod_category = {
}

formable_nations_africa_category = {
	formable_nations_africa = {
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nation_formed }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa }
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = africa_requirement_tooltip 
				OR = {
					AND = {
						all_state = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_on_continent = africa
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											state = 697
											state = 178
											state = 702
											state = 703
											state = 704
											state = 297
											state = 705
											state = 708
											state = 709
											state = 706
											state = 707
											state = 713
											state = 543
											state = 90
										}
									}
									is_controlled_by = ROOT
								}
								NOT = { is_on_continent = africa }
								state = 697
								state = 178
								state = 702
								state = 703
								state = 704
								state = 297
								state = 705
								state = 708
								state = 709
								state = 706
								state = 707
								state = 713
								state = 543
								state = 906
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AFR } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_africa
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AFR
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification	
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						is_on_continent = africa
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_south_america_category = {
	formable_nations_south_america = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nation_formed }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america }
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = south_america_requirement_tooltip 
				OR = {
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = south_america
								is_controlled_by = ROOT
								NOT = {
									state = 690
									state = 693
									state = 689
									state = 315
									state = 318
									state = 319
									state = 692
									state = 694
									state = 308
									state = 686
									state = 311
									state = 313
									state = 312
									state = 314
									state = 316
									state = 317
									state = 299
									state = 720
									state = 649
									state = 994
									state = 972
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								is_on_continent = south_america
							}
							OR = {
								state = 690
								state = 693
								state = 689
								state = 315
								state = 318
								state = 319
								state = 692
								state = 694
								state = 308
								state = 686
								state = 311
								state = 313
								state = 312
								state = 314
								state = 316
								state = 317
								state = 299
								state = 720
								state = 649
								state = 994
								state = 972
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SOU } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_south_america
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SOU
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_on_continent = south_america
						NOT = { 
							is_core_of = ROOT 
							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 315
							state = 318
							state = 319
							state = 692
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 686
							state = 311
							state = 313
							state = 312
							state = 314
							state = 316
							state = 317
						}
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_north_america_category = {
	formable_nations_north_america = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nation_formed }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			NOT = {	original_tag = USA	}
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america }
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		custom_trigger_tooltip = {
			tooltip = north_america_requirement_tooltip
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = {
									is_on_continent = north_america
									state = 311
									state = 313
									state = 312
									state = 314
									state = 316
									state = 317
									state = 685
									state = 304
								}
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 696
										state = 101
										state = 739
										state = 730
									}
								}
								is_controlled_by = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								OR = {
									is_on_continent = north_america 
									state = 311
									state = 313
									state = 312
									state = 314
									state = 316
									state = 317
									state = 685
									state = 304
								}
							}
							state = 696
							state = 101
							state = 739
							state = 730
						}
					}
				}

			}
		}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NOA } } }
			
		}
		icon = formable_nations_north_america
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NOA
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital = { state = 358 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_on_continent = north_america
							state = 690
							state = 693
							state = 689
							state = 315
							state = 318
							state = 319
							state = 692
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 686
							state = 311
							state = 313
							state = 312
							state = 314
							state = 316
							state = 317
							state = 685
							state = 304
						}
						NOT = { 
							is_core_of = ROOT
						}
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_americas_category = {
	formable_nations_americas = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nation_formed }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				capital_scope = {OR = { is_on_continent = north_america  is_on_continent = south_america } }
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = north_america_requirement_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
						
						all_state = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									OR = {
										is_on_continent = north_america
										state = 311
										state = 313
										state = 312
										state = 314
										state = 316
										state = 317
										state = 685
										state = 304
									}
									NOT = {
										OR = {
											state = 696
											state = 101
											state = 739
											state = 730
										}
									}
									is_controlled_by = ROOT
								}
								NOT = { 
									OR = {
										is_on_continent = north_america 
										state = 311
										state = 313
										state = 312
										state = 314
										state = 316
										state = 317
										state = 685
										state = 304
									}
								}
								state = 696
								state = 101
								state = 739
								state = 730
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = south_america_requirement_tooltip 
				OR = {
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = south_america
								is_controlled_by = ROOT
								NOT = {
									state = 690
									state = 693
									state = 689
									state = 315
									state = 318
									state = 319
									state = 692
									state = 694
									state = 308
									state = 686
									state = 311
									state = 313
									state = 312
									state = 314
									state = 316
									state = 317
									state = 299
									state = 720
									state = 649
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								is_on_continent = south_america
							}
							OR = {
								state = 690
								state = 693
								state = 689
								state = 315
								state = 318
								state = 319
								state = 692
								state = 694
								state = 308
								state = 686
								state = 311
								state = 313
								state = 312
								state = 314
								state = 316
								state = 317
								state = 299
								state = 720
								state = 649
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AME } } }
			
		}
		icon = formable_nations_americas
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AME
			
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital = { state = 304 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = { is_on_continent = north_america is_on_continent = south_america }
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

## Continent Formables END

formable_nations_mongol_empire_category = {
	formable_nations_mongol_empire = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				
				original_tag = MON
				original_tag = TAN
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = mongolia_requirement_tooltip 
				OR = {
					AND = {
						330 = { 
							OR = {
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							}	
						}		
						817 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						818 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						819 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						820 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = tibet_requirement_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						322 = { 
							OR = { is_controlled_by = ROOT 
							controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
						}
					} 
						757 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						758 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = china_requirement_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						615 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						621 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						746 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						622 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
							} 
						} 
						283 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						604 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						616 = { 
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT

formable_nations_grossdeutschland_category = {
	formable_nations_grossdeutschland = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = GER
				original_tag = AUS
				original_tag = SHL
				original_tag = MEK
				original_tag = BAY

				765 = { add_core_of = ROOT }

			IF = {

				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			
			# flag required for venezuelan focuses to progress properly.
			# otherwise venezuela locked out of gran colombian focuses after forming gran colombia
			set_country_flag = has_formed_gran_colombia
			
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GCO
			
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital = { state = 306 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				306 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				486 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				493 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				307 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				488 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				489 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				687 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				490 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				491 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				305 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				948 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				304 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1051 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1073 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			304 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			685 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

					check_variable = {

					}
				}

				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }

            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification

				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ABY
			
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				271 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				550 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				269 = { add_core_of = ROOT }

				908 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				843 = { add_core_of = ROOT }

formable_nations_levant_category = {
	formable_nations_levant = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = { 
				original_tag = MPL
				original_tag = SYR
				original_tag = LEB
				original_tag = PAL
				original_tag = JOR
				original_tag = ISR
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = levant_and_syria_requirement_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						553 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}

formable_nations_middle_east_category = {
	formable_nations_middle_east = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = middle_east_requirement_tooltip 
				OR = {
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = {
									is_on_continent = middle_east
									state = 341
									state = 797
									state = 907
									state = 447
									state = 452
									state = 456
									state = 457
									state = 552
								}
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 230
										state = 229
										state = 231 
										state = 826
										state = 415
									}
								}
								is_controlled_by = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								OR = {
									is_on_continent = middle_east
									state = 341
									state = 797
									state = 907
									state = 447
									state = 452
									state = 456
									state = 457
									state = 552
								}
							}
							state = 230
							state = 229
							state = 231 
							state = 826
							state = 415
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_MID } } }
			
		}
		icon = formable_nations_middle_east
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_MID
			
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital = { state = 291 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							is_on_continent = middle_east
							state = 341
							state = 797
							state = 907
							state = 447
							state = 452
							state = 456
							state = 457
							state = 552
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								state = 230
								state = 229
								state = 231 
								state = 826
								state = 415
							}
						}
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				ROOT = {
					GER = {
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = ROOT
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						add_popularity = {
							ideology = ROOT
							popularity = 0.8
						}
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = ROOT
						}
						add_core_of = GER
					}
				}
				add_to_faction = GER
				GER = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
				GER = {
					annex_country = {
						target = ROOT
						transfer_troops = yes
					}
					set_faction_leader = yes
					add_state_core = 762
					add_state_core = 86
					add_state_core = 85
					add_state_core = 807
					add_state_core = 188
					5 = { add_core_of = GER }
					42 = { add_core_of = GER }
					50 = { add_core_of = GER }
					51 = { add_core_of = GER }
					52 = { add_core_of = GER }
					53 = { add_core_of = GER }
					54 = { add_core_of = GER }
					55 = { add_core_of = GER }
					56 = { add_core_of = GER }
					57 = { add_core_of = GER }
					58 = { add_core_of = GER }
					59 = { add_core_of = GER }
					60 = { add_core_of = GER }
					61 = { add_core_of = GER }
					62 = { add_core_of = GER }
					63 = { add_core_of = GER }

					66 = { add_core_of = GER }

formable_nations_italy_category = {
	formable_nations_italy = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = PAP
				original_tag = TOS
				original_tag = TTS
				original_tag = SPM
				original_tag = LBV
				original_tag = SIC
				original_tag = SAD
				original_tag = MNC
				original_tag = SAN
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			NOT = {
				ITA = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = pre_war_italy_requirement_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						2 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						114 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT }

							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT

							} 
						}
						850= {
							OR = {

						912= {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GAU } } }
			
		}
		icon = formable_nations_italy
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = ITA
			
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital = { state = 2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				ROOT = {
					ITA = {
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = ROOT
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						add_popularity = {
							ideology = ROOT
							popularity = 0.8
						}
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = root
						}
						add_core_of = ITA
					}
				}
				add_to_faction = ITA
				ITA = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
				ITA = {
					annex_country = {
						target = ROOT
						transfer_troops = yes
					}
					set_faction_leader = yes
					
					2 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					39 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					850 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					114 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					115 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					117 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					849 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					156 = { add_core_of = ITA }

					158 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					159 = { add_core_of = ITA }

					161 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					162 = { add_core_of = ITA }
					736 = { add_core_of = ITA }

					850 = { add_core_of = ITA }

		}

							} 
						} 
						1017 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_KOH } } }
			
		}
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_KOH
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			add_ideas = r56rp_deus_vult
			set_capital = { state = 1016 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				811 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				454 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				966 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				949 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1016 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1017 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}

				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4

			set_cosmetic_tag = FRA_UK 
			set_global_flag = flag_franco_british_union
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				add_stability = -0.2
				add_war_support = -0.15
				if = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = ENG
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
						}
						add_claim_by = ENG
					}
					FRA = {
						every_unit_leader = {
							set_unit_leader_flag = flag_former_french_general
							set_nationality = ENG
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							original_tag = FRA
						}
						every_state = {
							limit = {
								is_core_of = ENG
							}
							add_claim_by = FRA
						}
						ENG = {
							every_unit_leader = {
								set_nationality = FRA
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						1 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			AND = {
				has_completed_focus = SPA_claim_the_aragonese_possessions
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ARAG  } } }
			
		}

		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ARAG
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				114 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				115 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				156 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				117 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				849 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				116 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1 =  { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			47 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }

		}
	}

			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SOUTHCHI

            add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed 
				747 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				325 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				599 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				593 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				592 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				594 = { add_core_of = ROOT }

				729 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				326 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			671 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }

		}

POR_expansionism_decision_category = {	#Portugal decisions to expand territorial reach
	POR_integrate_galicia = { 		#Portugal core Galicia
		icon = formable_nations_claim_galicia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		
		available = {
			owns_state = 171	#Controls Galicia
			has_completed_focus = POR_remember_olivenca
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = POR
			NOT = {
				171 = {	is_core_of = POR }
			}
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 171
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.02
			add_war_support = 0.01
			171 = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = autonomous_state
				}	
			}	
		}
		days_remove = 140
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01
		}	
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2 Stability and gains core on Galicia.
	 		add_stability = 0.015
			171 = {	add_core_of = ROOT }	
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

	POR_integrate_zambia = { 		#Portugal, gain compliance and reduce resistance on Zambia
		icon = formable_nations_zambia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 30
		
		available = {
			OR = {
				771 = {	is_controlled_by = ROOT	}
				771 = {	is_owned_by = ROOT	}
				771 = {	is_claimed_by = POR	}
			}	
			has_completed_focus = POR_luso_tropicalism
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = POR
		}

				
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 771	
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {		#Add state modifier 
			771 = { add_claim_by = POR 	
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = POR_colonial_integration
				}
			}
		}
		days_remove = 365
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

	POR_integrate_malawi = { 		#Portugal, gain compliance and reduce resistance on Malawi

			792 = { is_core_of = ROOT } 
		}

		complete_effect = {
			806 = { add_claim_by = SPR }
			add_stability = -0.01
		}

		days_remove = 365
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01
		}

		remove_effect = {	#add 3.5% stability, and core all of Portugal
	 		add_stability = 0.005
			806 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
		}
	}

		}

				state = 167
			}
		}

		}	
		
		days_remove = 45

     		political_power_gain = -0.35
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.035	
		}

	 		add_stability = 0.01

		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}

FRA_expanisonism_category = {	#Category with options to core several linguistic/historically-French states.
	FRA_core_wll = { 		#France core Wallonia
		icon = formable_nations_wallonia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 34	#Controls Wallonie
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = FRA		#Is France
			NOT = {
				has_government = neutrality		#Not visible if France is monarchist, as they get their own decision to integrate it.
			}	
		}
		complete_effect = {		#gain 2% war support upon clicking the decision.
			add_stability = -0.04
			add_war_support = 0.02
		}			
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 34
			}
		}
		days_remove = 150
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.35
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.012
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#add 3.5% stability, core Wallonie province, and claim Eupen-Malmedy province
	 		add_stability = 0.025
			34 = { add_core_of = ROOT }	
			965 = { add_claim_by = FRA }	
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}

	FRA_core_lux = { #France core Luxembourg
		icon = formable_nations_luxembourg
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 10
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 8	#Controls Luxembourg
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = FRA		#Is France
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 8
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {		#Lose 1 stability upon clicing decision, and gain 1.5 war support.
			add_stability = -0.01
			add_war_support = 0.0015
		}			
		
		days_remove = 180
		modifier = {		#Lose 1.05 Political Power and 0.1% stability per week for 180 days.
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#add 0.5% stability, and core Luxembourg
	 		add_stability = 0.005
			8 = { add_core_of = ROOT }	
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}

	FRA_core_jura_mountains= { 		#France core Jura Mountains
		icon = formable_nations_jura
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25

			controls_state = 845		#Controls Jura Mountains
		}

				state = 845
			}
		}

		}

			add_stability = -0.025
			add_war_support = 0.015
			845 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = swiss_partisans
				}		
			}
		}			
		days_remove = 210
		modifier = {		#Lose 1 Political Power, and gain 0.5% consumer goods for 210 days.
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.005
		}		
		remove_effect = {		#add 1.5% stability, remove funny modifier, and core Jura Mountains

				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = swiss_partisans
				}	
			}	
		}

			factor = 100		
		}

	cze_become_zapadoslavia = { 		#Czechoslovakia become Zapadoslavia
		icon = formable_nations_zapadoslavia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 0
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 10		#Warsawza
			controls_state = 88		#Krakow
			controls_state = 90		#Kielce
			controls_state = 92		#Lublin
			controls_state = 87		#Lodz
			controls_state = 98		#Plock
			controls_state = 97		#Bialystok
			controls_state = 934	#Suwalki
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = CZE		#Is Czechoslovakia
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = HUN_EMPIRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_VIS
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_INT
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GMO
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AEA
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = -70
			set_capital = {
				state = 88
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ZAP
			custom_effect_tooltip = cze_claims_on_poland_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				10 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				88 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				90 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				92 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				98 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				87 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				97 = { add_claim_by = CZE }				
				934 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				762 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				86 = { add_claim_by = CZE }	
				89 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				91 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				93 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				94 = { add_claim_by = CZE }			
				95 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				935 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				96 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				784 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				936 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				807 = { add_claim_by = CZE }	
				85 = { add_claim_by = CZE }						
			}
		}		
		
		days_remove = 125
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.35
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.055
	 		stability_weekly = -0.002
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.02
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = {
				88 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				92 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				90 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				87 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				98 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				97 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				934 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}
}

	cze_integrate_poz = { 		#Czechoslovakia Core Poznan
		icon = generic_civil_support
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 86		#Poznan
		}	
		
		visible = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = CZE		#Is Czechoslovakia
				original_tag = SLO		#Is Slovakia
			}
			has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ZAP
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 86
			}
		}

		}

pol_initial_zapadoslavia_formable = { 		#Czechoslovakia become Zapadoslavia
	pol_become_zapadoslavia = {
		
		icon = formable_nations_zapadoslavia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 0
		
		available = {
			OR = {	#Restrictions preventing people from getting the benefits of multiple monarchist paths
				has_completed_focus = POL_radicalize_the_front
				has_completed_focus = POL_complete_april_constitution
				has_completed_focus = POL_rewrite_1935_constitution
				has_completed_focus = POL_cossack_king
			}
			controls_state = 9		#Cechy
			controls_state = 75	#Moravia
			controls_state = 72	#Zaolzie
			controls_state = 70	#Western Slovakia
			controls_state = 71	#Eastern Slovaia

		}
		
		visible = {
			NOT = {		#Restrictions preventing people forming multiple formables in one game
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_COM
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_VIS
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_INT
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GMO
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AEA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_POH
				has_cosmetic_tag = PLC_UNIFIED
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_WOR
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = -60
			set_capital = {
				state = 88
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ZAP
			custom_effect_tooltip = pol_claims_on_czechoslovaia_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				9 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				75 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				72 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				70 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				71 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				69 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				74 = { add_claim_by = CZE }				
				996 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				73 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				664 = { add_claim_by = CZE }						
			}
		}		
		
		days_remove = 165
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.3
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.045	
	 		stability_weekly = -0.003
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 3.5 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.035
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = {
				9 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				75 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				70 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				71 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				72 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				97 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				934 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}
}

austrian_expansion = {
	reunify_with_hungary_dem = {
		icon = formable_nations_danubian_hungary
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 35
		
		available = {
			# Austria
			controls_state = 43
			controls_state = 155
			controls_state = 913
			controls_state = 154
		}	
		
		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = form_austria_hungary_flag }	
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.035
			add_war_support = 0.01
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = fascism
				popularity = -0.03	
			}	
			set_global_flag = form_austria_hungary_flag
			set_cosmetic_tag = HUN_EMPIRE	
		}			
		days_remove = 70
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.75
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.05	
		}		
		remove_effect = {
	 		add_stability = 0.015
	 		custom_effect_tooltip = hun_cored_by_aus_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				43 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				155 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				913 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				154 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
			}	
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}

	reunify_austria_sudetenland_dem = { # Not Democratic - All Ideologies
		icon = formable_nations_danubian_bohemia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25
		available = {
			# Austria
			controls_state = 69
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {

			}

			add_war_support = 0.01	
		}

     		political_power_gain = -0.40
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.045	
		}

		remove_effect = {
			add_stability = 0.025
			custom_effect_tooltip = aus_cores_on_sudetenland_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				69 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				74 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				72 = { add_core_of = ROOT }	
			}

bul_become_yugoslavia = {	#Decisions for Bulgaria to go ham on some territories.
	bul_initial_yugoslavia_formable = { 		
		icon = formable_nations_greater_yugoslavia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 0
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = BUL_controls_required_yugoslavia_states_tt
				controls_state = 108
				controls_state = 107
				controls_state = 963
				controls_state = 104
				controls_state = 962
				controls_state = 804
				controls_state = 952
				controls_state = 103
				controls_state = 958
				controls_state = 105
				controls_state = 959
				controls_state = 109
				controls_state = 961
				controls_state = 803
				controls_state = 106
				controls_state = 212
				controls_state = 48
				controls_state = 801
				controls_state = 211
			}
		}	
		
		complete_effect = {		#Gain 5 war support, add shit-load of claims, and show explanatory tooltip
			set_cosmetic_tag = YUG
			add_war_support = 0.05
			custom_effect_tooltip = BUL_unlocks_yugoslav_integration_decisions_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				108 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				953 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				803 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				802 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				105 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				963 = {
					add_claim_by = BUL	
				}
				952 = {

			owns_state = 184

formable_nations_west_africa_category = {
	form_west_african_union = {
		fire_only_once = yes
		icon = formable_nations_west_africa
		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = SEN
				original_tag = TOG
				original_tag = IVO
				original_tag = CMR
				original_tag = DAH
				original_tag = GNA
				original_tag = NGA
				original_tag = LIB
				original_tag = MLI
			}
	
		}
		visible = {
			#avoid west africa - Ancient Mali combo
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = MALI_UNITED
			}
		}
		available = { #
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = SEN }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = TOG }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = IVO }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = CMR }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = DAH }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = GNA }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = NGA }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = SIE }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = LIB }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}            
		}
		complete_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = WAU_UNITED
			#if = {
			#    limit = {
			#        278 = { is_capital = no }
			#    }
			#    set_capital = 278
			#}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = { #This has a day of lag, for some reason.
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = IVO
							is_core_of = CMR
							is_core_of = DAH
							is_core_of = TOG
							is_core_of = SEN
							is_core_of = GNA
							is_core_of = NGA
							is_core_of = LIB
							is_core_of = SIE
							is_core_of = GNB
							is_core_of = GAM
							is_core_of = LIB
						}
					}
					add_core_of = PREV #ROOT
				}
				news_event = { id = r56.news_event.37 hours = 6 }
				274 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
		}
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}	
}

				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_REBORN

		}
	}

		}

			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations

formable_nations_rashidun_caliphate_category = {
	formable_nations_rashidun = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		icon = formable_nations_rashidun
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = PER
				original_tag = TAJ
				original_tag = IRQ
				original_tag = EGY
				original_tag = SYR
				original_tag = SAU
				original_tag = YEM
				original_tag = OMA
				original_tag = AFG
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			#custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_requirement_1_tt
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = is_puppet_tooltip OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed } }
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = r56rp_requirement_1_tt
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 50
					# Afghanistan
					# Afghanistan
					415 = {
						OR = {
							is_controlled_by = ROOT
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					267 = {
						OR = {
							is_controlled_by = ROOT
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					1008 = {
						OR = {
							is_controlled_by = ROOT
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					1009 = {
						OR = {
							is_controlled_by = ROOT
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					1010 = {
						OR = {
							is_controlled_by = ROOT
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					1011 = {
						OR = {

formable_nations_amazonia_category = {
	formable_nations_amazonia = {
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = { 
				original_tag = ECU
				original_tag = BRA
				original_tag = COL
				original_tag = VEN
				original_tag = PRU
				original_tag = BOL
				original_tag = GYA
				original_tag = SUR
				original_tag = CAY
			}
		}
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = amazonia_tt
				OR = {
					AND = {
						280 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						486 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						487 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						488 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						490 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						491 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						494 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						495 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						497 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						504 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						505 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						1001 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}
				}
			}
		}
		icon = formable_nations_amazonia
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AMAZ
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification	
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				280 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				486 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				487 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				488 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				490 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				491 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				494 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				495 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				497 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				504 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				505 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1001 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1052 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1058 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1072 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1056 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1073 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_ideas = r56rp_riches_of_the_amazon
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
		}
	}
}

			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification

				30 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				23 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				33 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				26 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				20 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				32 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				735 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				806 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				31 = { add_core_of = ROOT }

usa_complete_the_manifest_destiny = {	#Decisions for the US to go APE MODE
	usa_integrate_pacific_canada = { 		#USA integrate British-Columbia / Yukon
		icon = formable_nations_british_columbia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 50
		
		available = {
			owns_state = 473		#British Columbia
			owns_state = 471		#Upper British Columbia
			owns_state = 864		#Yukon
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = USA
			NOT = {
				473 = {	is_core_of = USA	}
			}
			OR = {	
				has_war_with = CAN
				controls_state = 473
				controls_state = 471
				controls_state = 864
				controls_state = 740
				controls_state = 739
			}
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 473
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {		#Remove 1.5 stability, and claim on all Pacific Canadian states
			add_stability = -0.015
			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_claim_pacific_canada_tt	
				hidden_effect =	{
				473 = { add_claim_by = USA }
				471 = { add_claim_by = USA }
				740 = { add_claim_by = USA }
				864 = { add_claim_by = USA }
				739 = { add_claim_by = USA }
			}
		}
		
		days_remove = 145
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.12
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.007	
		}		

		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2.5 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.01
			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_core_pacific_canada_tt	
			hidden_effect =	{
				473 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				471 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				740 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				864 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				739 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

					limit = {
						is_core_of = QBC
					}
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = quebecs_last_stand
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebec_conscription_crisis
					}	
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebec_conscription_crisis_compromise
					}							
				}
			}
		}
		
		days_remove = 315
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.3
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.02
		}		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 3 Stability, gains core on all required states, and removes the "Quebec's Last Stand" modifier.
	 		add_stability = 0.03
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_quebec_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				468 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
				862 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
				466 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT

						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
				861 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
				860 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT

						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
				863 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = quebecs_last_stand
					}		
				}
			}
		}

		}

				464 = {	is_core_of = USA	}
			}
			OR = {	
				has_war_with = CAN
				controls_state = 464
				controls_state = 465
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 464
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {		#Remove 1.5 stability, and claim on Alberta/Northwest
			add_stability = -0.01
			add_state_claim = 465
			add_state_claim = 464
		}
		
		days_remove = 140
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.12
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.004
		}		

		remove_effect = {		#Gain 1 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.01
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect =	{
				465 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				464 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

		icon = formable_nations_mexican_empire

		cost = 55

			owns_state = 484
			owns_state = 483
			owns_state = 482
		}	
		
		visible = {
			484 = {	is_claimed_by = USA	}
			483 = {	is_claimed_by = USA	}
			482 = {	is_claimed_by = USA	}
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 483
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {		#Removes 2 stability, and adds shitty province modifier to the states that are gonna get cores
			add_stability = -0.02
			484 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = mexicos_last_stand
				}		
			}
			483 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = mexicos_last_stand
				}		
			}
			482 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = mexicos_last_stand
				}		
			}
		}
		days_remove = 315
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.25
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01	
		}		

		remove_effect = {		#Gain cores on all required states.
			custom_effect_tooltip = usa_cored_nw_mexico_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				484 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = mexicos_last_stand
					}		
				}
				483 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = mexicos_last_stand
					}		
				}
				482 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = mexicos_last_stand
					}		
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 100	
		}

formable_nations_sabaean_kingdom_category = {
	formable_sabaean_kingdom = {
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = YEM
				original_tag = OMA
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = kingdom_of_heaven_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						293 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						659 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						858 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						856 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						883 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						550	= {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SAB } } }	
		}
		icon = formable_nations_saba
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SAB
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed }
			293 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			659 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			858 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			856 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			883 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			550 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_himyar_category = {
	formable_himyar_kingdom = {
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = YEM
				original_tag = ISR
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = kingdom_of_heaven_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						293 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						659 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HIM } } }	
		}
		icon = formable_nations_himyar
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HIM
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed }
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = ISR
				}
				293 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				659 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
				add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
				add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			}
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = CRI
				original_tag = DON
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = kingdom_of_heaven_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {
						137 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						234 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						218 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						227 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						196 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						200 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						227 = {
							OR = { 
								is_controlled_by = ROOT 
								controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_CRIK } } }
		}

		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}

			capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_CRIK
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = nation_formed
				137 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				234 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				218 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				227 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				196 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				200 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				227 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
		}
	}
}

	formable_nations_pashtun_state = {
		icon = formable_nations_pashtun

		visible = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR = {
				original_tag = PAK
				original_tag = AFG
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = kingdom_of_heaven_tooltip
				OR = {
					AND = {

							OR = {

							}

					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt

formable_nations_german_austria_category = {
	formable_nations_german_austria = {
		icon = formable_nations_german_austria
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25
		available = {
			# Austria
			controls_state = 69
			controls_state = 74
			controls_state = 72
		}

		visible = {
			original_tag = AUS
		}

		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_normalwargoaldeclaration =  60789.984 }
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_focuswargoaldeclaration = 60785.64 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.02
			add_war_support = 0.01	
		}
		
		days_remove = 45
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.40
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01	
		}

		remove_effect = {
			add_stability = 0.025
			custom_effect_tooltip = aus_cores_on_sudetenland_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				69 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				74 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				72 = { add_core_of = ROOT }	
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GERM_AUS_BRR
		}	
	}
}
